docTitle.titlePart:
HIGHER ORDER MODES DAMPING FOR 9-CELL STRUCTURE WITH
MODIFIED DRIFT TUBE

byline.affiliation:
National Research Nuclear University MEPhI
(Moscow Engineering Physics Institute),

front.div:
Abstract
This paper is focused on HOM damping in 9-cell
superconducting cavities. We are considering HOM
propagation outside from the cavity ridged and fluted drift
tubes. The analysis of the influence of the parameters of
the drift tube on the HOM damping was conducted. The
considered methods were analysed and compared.
